description: Gets information about a single audit finding. Properties include the reason for noncompliance, the severity of the issue, and the start time when the audit that returned the finding. Requires permission to access the DescribeAuditFinding action.

parameters.name: findingId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a single audit finding. You can use this identifier to apply mitigation actions to the finding.

nested_items.name: findingId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for this set of audit findings. This identifier is used to apply mitigation tasks to one or more sets of findings.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the audit that generated this result (finding).

nested_items.name: checkName
nested_items.description: The audit check that generated this result.

nested_items.name: taskStartTime
nested_items.description: The time the audit started.

nested_items.name: findingTime
nested_items.description: The time the result (finding) was discovered.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the result (finding).

nested_items.name: nonCompliantResource
nested_items.description: The resource that was found to be noncompliant with the audit check.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the noncompliant resource.

nested_items.name: resourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: Information that identifies the noncompliant resource.

nested_items.name: deviceCertificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the certificate attached to the resource.

nested_items.name: caCertificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the CA certificate used to authorize the certificate.

nested_items.name: cognitoIdentityPoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool.

nested_items.name: clientId
nested_items.description: The client ID.

nested_items.name: policyVersionIdentifier
nested_items.description: The version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the policy.

nested_items.name: policyVersionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: account
nested_items.description: The account with which the resource is associated.

nested_items.name: iamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has overly permissive actions.

nested_items.name: roleAliasArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role alias that has overly permissive actions.

nested_items.name: issuerCertificateIdentifier
nested_items.description: The issuer certificate identifier.

nested_items.name: issuerCertificateSubject
nested_items.description: The subject of the issuer certificate.

nested_items.name: issuerId
nested_items.description: The issuer ID.

nested_items.name: issuerCertificateSerialNumber
nested_items.description: The issuer certificate serial number.

nested_items.name: deviceCertificateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the identified device certificate.

nested_items.name: additionalInfo
nested_items.description: Other information about the noncompliant resource.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relatedResources
nested_items.description: The list of related resources.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resource.

nested_items.name: resourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: Information that identifies the resource.

nested_items.name: deviceCertificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the certificate attached to the resource.

nested_items.description: The ID of the CA certificate used to authorize the certificate.

nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool.

nested_items.name: clientId
nested_items.description: The client ID.

nested_items.description: The version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the policy.

nested_items.name: policyVersionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: account
nested_items.description: The account with which the resource is associated.

nested_items.name: iamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has overly permissive actions.

nested_items.description: The ARN of the role alias that has overly permissive actions.

nested_items.name: issuerCertificateIdentifier

(string) ---

nested_items.name: reasonForNonCompliance
nested_items.description: The reason the resource was noncompliant.

nested_items.name: reasonForNonComplianceCode
nested_items.description: A code that indicates the reason that the resource was noncompliant.

nested_items.name: isSuppressed
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the audit finding was suppressed or not during reporting.
